value.title: Hyundai Ioniq 5 EV will serve as Motional's next self-driving taxi
value.excerpt: The lovely Ioniq 5 is in for the robotaxi treatment. If Motional has its way, and autonomy plans out as the company sees it, the Hyundai Ioniq 5 will serve as an autonomous taxi.
